plist.dict:
UTExportedTypeDeclarations
UTTypeConformsTo
public.xml
UTTypeIdentifier org.apache.uima.xmi UTTypeTagSpecification
public.filename-extension xmi public.mime-type text/xml
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion English CFBundleExecutable ${cfBundleExecutable} CFBundleIconFile ${iconFile} CFBundleIdentifier ${mainClass} CFBundleDisplayName ${bundleName} CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName ${bundleName} CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString ${version} CFBundleSignature ???? CFBundleVersion 1 NSHumanReadableCopyright
NSHighResolutionCapable
NSSupportsAutomaticGraphicsSwitching
JVMRuntime ${jrePath} JVMMainClassName ${mainClass} JVMClassPaths ${classpath} JVMVersion ${jvmVersion} JVMOptions ${jvmOptions} JVMArguments
LauncherWorkingDirectory ${workingDirectory} CFBundleDocumentTypes
CFBundleTypeName Xmi File LSHandlerRank Owner LSItemContentTypes
org.apache.uima.xmi
CFBundleTypeRole Viewer
